Articles.Content:
Hi,

Is there any mod that has a complete Space Shuttle in it, or a good tail section + wings? All the ones I can find on kerbalstuff don't work in 1.0.5.

 

 

Thanks

Here's one that I have helped work on:

 

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/121472-space-shuttle-ssp-for-ksp/
Yeah, that one gives version errors, just tried it.
Mike is working on a fix right now...alternatively, DECQ just produced a new Buran model

Great, will keep an eye out for it, looks good!

I'm trying to make all the NASA ships, the shuttle is one of the last ones   I use SSTU for the SLS/DeltaIV/Orion and FASA for the Apollo/Gemini capsules. Never really made a shuttle as with stock parts it looks goofy.

oh yeah, I can understand.  BTW, for the NASA space shuttles, just be patient.  Mike-NZ had been out for a few months on account of life issues and just returned.  knowing his pace, he can get a fix out shortly.  In the meantime, would you like for me to get you the link to DECQ's Buran?  (Russian Space shuttle)  From my experience, they fly almost the same way (albeit the Buran can be equiped with jet engines for atmospheric flight) and would be good to help you practice the skills you will need to fly the NASA shuttles.
Here's the link to the Buran

I've just made a Buran from stock parts that I think manages to not look goofy.  Feel free to check it out

 

SM

On 11/30/2015, 9:04:15, Sampa said:

Here's the link to the Buran

You forgot the link to Buran.

1 minute ago, mcirish3 said:

You forgot the link to Buran.

oops! 

Ok, this should fix that problem!

 

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/79479-energy-buran-project-ksp-105-v13/
